definition: scroll/book/volume/chapter/examination paper/classifier for books, paintings: volume, scroll
to roll up/roll/classifier for small rolled things (wad of paper money, movie reel etc)
to roll (up)/to sweep up/to carry on/roll

sentences.english: A scientist said they were probably picked up by a waterspout or mini-tornado out at sea.
sentences.chinese: 科学家说它们很可能是被龙卷风从海上卷来的。

sentences.english: Tornado sudden and violent attacks, the wind is the strongest on the ground.
sentences.chinese: 龙卷的袭击突然而猛烈，产生的风是地面上最强的。

sentences.english: The tornado disrupted broadcasting along the entire coast.
sentences.chinese: 龙卷风使整个沿海的广播都中断了。

sentences.english: They can show themselves as water spouts .
sentences.chinese: 他们可以查看自己的水龙卷。

sentences.english: Much of Greensburg, Kansas has been leveled by a tornado.
sentences.chinese: 差不多整个堪萨斯州的格林斯堡都被龙卷风推平了。

sentences.english: In some areas, red earth produces dramatic scarlet-hued tornadoes.
sentences.chinese: 在有一些地方，红色的地球制造猩红色的龙卷风。

sentences.english: In fact, 70 percent of tornado warnings are false alarms.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，70%的龙卷风警报都是误报。

sentences.english: Waterspouts are spinning columns of rising moist air that typically form over warm water.
sentences.chinese: 水龙卷的旋转柱上升潮湿的空气，通常形式的温水。

sentences.english: 1884 - First known photograph of a tornado is made.
sentences.chinese: 1884年的今天，首张已知的龙卷风照片被拍摄。

sentences.english: Tornadoes have a strong instability in the cumulonimbus of.
sentences.chinese: 龙卷风产生于强烈不稳定的积雨云中。

sentences.english: Further south in Washington County, Alabama, a large tornado was reported on the ground.
sentences.chinese: 报道说，华盛顿市偏南的地区，还有一股大的龙卷风。

sentences.english: It's one of many tornados that are destroying our city.
sentences.chinese: 这是那些毁灭我们城市的龙卷风之一。

sentences.english: And rebuilding after the floods and tornadoes may deliver a fillip in the second half of the year.
sentences.chinese: 而且洪水以及龙卷风后重建也可以刺激下半年的经济。

sentences.english: US deadliest tornado kills 122 people in Missouri.
sentences.chinese: 美国密苏苏里州遭致命龙卷风袭击，122人死亡。

sentences.english: A spectacle of two dragons drinking water appeared in Shekou, Shenzhen.
sentences.chinese: 据我理解，说的是在深圳出现的水龙卷。

sentences.english: The funnel crowd dropped right there at the laundromat.
sentences.chinese: 龙卷风正好到达自助洗衣店。

definition: see 龍捲風|龙卷风[long2 juan3 feng1]
in Daoism, astral wind on which immortals may ride/strong wind
water screen (screen formed of sprayed water droplets, used for displaying projected images, for temperature control, or for air purification)
